Title: Directs a study of linkages between cancer and neurological diseases and contaminated environments
Summary: Directs the department of health and the department of environmental conservation to conduct a study analyzing linkages between cancer and neurological diseases and contaminated environments.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the department of health and the department of environmental conservation to conduct a study analyzing linkages between cancer and neurological diseases and contaminated environments; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
